programme.title: Piranha
programme.desc: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

programme.title: Uninvited
programme.desc: A cat injected with a genetically-engineered virus escapes a laboratory and stows away on a criminal's yacht.

programme.title: Amityville: Dollhouse
programme.desc: A girl unwittingly releases evil spirits lurking within her toy house, which wreak havoc upon her family.

programme.title: Amityville: It's About Time
programme.desc: A widowed father brings an evil antique clock home from a business trip for his teenage kids.

programme.title: Phantasm 5: Ravager
programme.desc: Reggie wanders through the desert, but suddenly awakes in a different dimension.

programme.title: Road Games
programme.desc: An American truck driver starts to suspect a man driving a green van of killing young women along his route.

programme.title: Summer of 84
programme.desc: Teenager Davey Armstrong is a conspiracy theorist who begins to suspect that a neighbouring police officer is a serial killer.

programme.title: Silent Night, Bloody Night
programme.desc: A man inherits a mansion which once was a mental home. He visits the place and begins to investigate some crimes that happened in old times, scaring the people living in the region.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre
programme.sub-title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: Frankenstein's Castle of Freaks
programme.desc: The count recruits a dwarf and others to help him put a brain in the body of a brute.

programme.title: The Slumber Party Massacre
programme.desc: Trish's slumber party for her basketball teammates includes an unexpected guest.

programme.title: Uninvited
programme.desc: A cat injected with a genetically-engineered virus escapes a laboratory and stows away on a criminal's yacht.

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: During their Christmas break, a group of sorority girls are stalked by a stranger.

programme.title: Mortuary
programme.desc: Christie's nightmares grow worse after her father drowns, revealing a sinister truth tied to the mortuary.

programme.title: The Nest
programme.desc: A biological experiment goes haywire when meat-eating mutant roaches invade an island community.

programme.title: Creepshow 3
programme.desc: This second sequel to Creepshow features five new tales of horror.
